summary: Julian and Jeremy, two brothers prefer to spend their time on drugs and joyriding. When their father, Fatty Lewis, they show up demanding compensation.
cast: Llyr Ifans|Rhys Ifans|Dorien Thomas|Dougray Scott|Buddug Williams|Ronnie Williams|Huw Ceredig|Rachel Scorgie|Di Botcher|Mary Allen|Paul Durden|David Hayman|Kevin Allen|Brian Hibbard|Morgan Hopkins|Sion Tudor Owen|William Thomas|Danny Durden|Jenny Evans|Sue Roderick|Helen Griffin|Royston John|Julie Stichbury|Gillian Elisa|Steffan Rhodri|Nicholas McGaughey|Brian Hancock|Martin Ace|Bhasker Patel|Michael Cunningham|Boyd Clack|Keith Allen|Michael Dickins
title: Twin Town
